content.detailedDescription: Last night i took my dog out for a walk as usual.I was looking up at the stars like i always do here in the country because there are no street lights to interfere.In the south i saw a very large object moving north. it was round and had several multi colored fast blinking lights.I told my room mate to come out and look at this.We could not believe what we were seeing.I tried to find a logical excuse for it but i could not.I see planes here all the time and am very familiar with how they look at night. it was not a plane,meteor,satellite or anything even remotely resembling anything like that.As it got closer we noticed it was making a humming sound.When it was in the northern sky suddenly there was another object with two bright red lights moving at an extreme speed toward it from the west.Then another object with two red lights coming from the east moving at an unbelievable speed went past it and made an abrupt u-turn and went towards the large round one.By this time the round one was not visible because of a tree.At this time another red one or possible one of the other two came from the east and suddenly disappeared in the west.I have never seen anything like this in my life. hopefully if i ever see it again i'll have my camera ready.
content.summary: 1 large round object with multi color fast strobe lights and 3 smaller objects moving at incredible speed  with 2 red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sky from out of my top window of my house, with my night vision just scanning the air for satellite's and stars as there is a lot of light pollution above the hague, night vision is almost required to see stars, you only see very bright stars with out it.

note: it capture's infrared.

it where multiple objects like a asteroid/ comet that hits the earths atmosphere and explodes. it could be easily right that but i don't know.
it all took less then a second. all in a circle at what seemed to be random place's about 7 or 8 "falling stars" with small tails color = unknown as night vision makes it green it gave me a adrenaline shock and right after i might have seen a orb making a little up down movement and vanished. this all happened in the direction of the constellation cepheus.
content.summary: Looked like 7 a 8 falling stars at the same time close to each other less than a second (nightvision).

content.detailedDescription: Went outside about midnight.  i noticed way up in the sky (it was the size of a star you would see in the night sky) an object travel across the length of the sky from south to north.  continued watching sky and saw about 6 more of these star size objects go across the sky another from south to north one from se to n.  they covered the distance of the skyline in about 30sec.  they were extremely high in the air no way to make out a shape could have been shooting stars but i dont know.  i have seen shooting stars before and these didnt act the same way.  no trail behind them and didnt appear to descend.  i did take pictures of the sky for some time and did find a object pop up in 2 photos that doesnt show in any others.   this object looks like a star???
content.summary: Observed approximately 6-7 very high objects travel accross sky.

content.detailedDescription:
As usual....
every night i send an invitation to spacecrafts to show up... 
and they answered!

look at the images.
content.summary: Triangle orbs formation and yellow star.

content.detailedDescription:
i had gotten home from work about an hour earlier. i had eaten a late dinner and had taken a bath. at around 2045 my wife went to bed and about 5 minutes later the dogs started barking and acting up. i stepped outside the back door to smoke a cigarette and check to see if anything was running our cows or raiding the chickens. i didn't see anything out of order, and the dogs stayed in the driveway, instead of chasing anything out of the pasture.
 the past month we had several bats that would feed over the pond at dusk. while finishing my cigarette i decided to scan the sky to see if i could see any bats before the light faded. 
 in the north east sky i noticed a bright star or planet, low on the horizon, just above the trees that line a ridge that runs in that direction. i then looked up in the sky to see if there were any other stars visible. i remember seeing another star and thinking that it wasn't near as bright as the first star. i then looked back and noticed that the first star had moved from it's initial location. i then noticed that it was slowly moving, almost floating, in a south east direction. it appeared to be one bright light, blue at first, it then turned white and then settled on an orange color. the light did not blink or pulsate. it was definitely not a plane's lights or a shooting star. 
 i could not determine the size, but i did notice that although it was making no noise the dogs continued to act up and bark. i then went inside and woke my wife up and had her come outside. she could also not identify what the object could be. she then turned the air conditioner off, so she could verify that it was making no noise.
 it then slowly floated in a straight line, with no apparent changes in altitude until it went over the ridge and we lost sight of it. i went inside and looked at my watch, it was 2110. i also noticed that the dogs had settled down after i went back outside to look at the sky.
content.summary: Starlike object slowly moved across horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
Already wrote in length.

pertaining to area/site, area/terrain. the gulf of mexico is approx 30- 40 mi. south of this location, immediately south is as followed, a field, small forest, lowlands, and then farmland; to the north is lake arthur.
content.summary: What i thought was a satellite, stopped moving and moved in another direction. another object then moved north from the primary object.

content.detailedDescription:
On a cool i think fall day my younger brother and i were walking down our lane to the bus stop. i say lane because our house sat back down a dirt lane from the main street.As we rounded a curve in the road i felt that something was behind us up high...It wasn't that i heard it, it was a feeling as if i could feel a pulsing,humm. i turned and looked up at the tree, which was a huge grand oak tree. an there was a thing that was spinning on the outer edge but the higher center part seem to be still. it was shiney, but i was looking trying to understand what i was seeing. i was looking for wires something to make what i saw make sense as to how could this just be spinning in mid-air standing still.I didn't see anything...I heard a voice say to me in my head "come with us," i just said in my head "no,i have to stay with my brother," i could not see leaving him down that road alone. i was not afraid or anything it was very surereal. it started to move away...It seem to bend the light because it started to close in on itself and look like the sky and clouds as it moved away not far from where it hovered and i could tell it just seem to take off real fast as it changed to look like the sky.

my brother and i just turned around and started walking to catch the bus, i looked back i think once and pulled him closer so they wouldn't try to come back and take him away. we never talked about this all these 30 plus  years, i didn't run to the bus diver and tell him.I never said one word to my parents.

but this december of 2008,i was having to have major surgery and my family came to ******* because things didn't look good for me.The only person i ever told my story to was my then 15yr.Old son. when my family and i were all sitting in my den he said to me "mom, ask uncle **** now about it."i felt ashamed...What if this was something i made up in my head...Then my brother said to me "i know what you want to ask me...Did we see that ...," i started to cry all these years i thought this was something very crazy some how i made up in my head and my eyes had played a sick joke on me...But you can't tell people you saw something like this...No way in hell this would be believed........I asked my brother to just tell me what he remembered it is just the way i saw it completely.

i saw a metal shiney thing that seem to bend light it was oval and seem to get larger after it stood still with just the outer portion spinning really fast.It seem to get smaller and bend the light to look like the sky and clouds just like a camillion would.

a lot of people seem to think these events that are reported are just by crazy white people looking for attention, but i'm a sane black woman and this happened, why we saw it, why they wanted me, i have no clue but it did happened and i will take a lie detector test to prove it to anyone,this fact will go with me to my grave....
content.summary: My brother and i were walking to the bus stop and it appeared above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
my son and i were on a nightly walk looking up at clear starry night when we suddenly noticed a "very" white bright ball gliding like maybe at 2k ft to 3k ft high. at first we thought airplane but the light was so unusual we kept an eye on it. speed maybe 400 miles an hour, made no sound. after 40 some seconds of viewing the bright light just simply went off, nothing there at all. unlike airplanes this had no blinking lights; it was just solid very bright white.
 my son said it reminded him of looking into a white led flashlight it was so true white. it was no police helicopter, which we sometimes see. 
 i believe i can confidently say this was no meteor gliding through the atmosphere. there was no vapor trail; it traveled level to the ground and almost over our heads. any meteor i���������ve seen flickers, this object was rock solid light.
 we saw the object walking in the north garland texas area south of fire wheel mall. this part of garland is part of dfw airport flight circle. no plane is ever over here unless it's lit up with blinking lights/red light/ yellowish lights. we purposely observed all planes after that they were all fully lit up and stayed that way.
 granted some airplanes can change angle and you lose some sight of the lights but this object in front of us seem to disappear.
content.summary: Very large bright plasma white ball traveling slow suddenly went out.

content.detailedDescription:
my family and i were vacationing at our cabin in aitkin,mn (central mn). during the early morning hours on 07-14-10 i was awakened to a loud thump which i thought was a branch landing on the cabin.  i discovered it was the bathroom door slamming from the wind.  it was 3:15 am and i was up so i let the dogs outside.  the night sky was full of stars like it always is up there.  when i looked up in the sky to the southwest i saw a bright object which i first thought might be a star or planet.  when the object began to fade and disappear i noticed that the wind would die down.  i then saw it appear again and become brighter.  when this happened i noticed that the gusts of wind would pick up.  the object, what i could only describe as circular or orb like, sat above the tree tops and i thought maybe something was reflecting in the sky.  when i moved away from the trees closer to the lake i could see that the object was independent of anything else.  it was in the sky and appeared lower than any of the stars around it.  the object started to move in almost a side to side motion but straight and not pendulum like.  as i stared at it, it probably moved a few yards back and forth and then settled again.  at this point i woke up my wife through the bedroom window of the cabin in order to get confirmation of what i was actually seeing.  she looked outside the window and told me she saw it and that she also saw it moving.  i told her to keep an eye on it while i got my binoculars from my car.  when i looked at the object through binoculars i did not notice any other shape around it, only a bright white light. i then noticed that the object started to fade again and disappear with only the stars left behind it.  the wind again died down when the object faded.
while i continued to look where the object was i noticed that it began to reappear and become brighter again and the wind gusts started up.  this time the object moved across the tree tops a short distance and stopped again.  i had set up a lawn chair and began watching the object through binoculars as it sat in the sky.  my wife joined me and watched it move.  when it faded again and the wind stopped she decided that it made her a little too nervous so she went back inside.  i then got my wifes cell phone to try and record the object as is reappeared again and the wind picking up.  due to the quality of the phone and camera it didn't show much.  the object appeared as a small speck on video and oddly enough looked red.  i remained outside for about forty five minutes watching it move back and forth and continue to fade and get brighter.  when i went back to bed i could still see the object through the window until i saw it fade away again around 4:05am.  
just to note, there were no sounds of helicopters and i am not sure if a drone would produce that much wind while hovering or why one would be there.  i am not a skeptic but like to weigh the facts.  i have been a le officer for 14 years and have never seen anything like this.
from what i saw in the sky i know it was nothing i have seen before.  just thought i would share the experience.  thanks.
content.summary: White orb like object moving in sky...Would get bright and fade.

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:25p.M. on 7-14-10 i walked out my front door facing south just to feel a cool breeze.As soon as i opened the door i saw approximatly 6 red spheres flying in a sort of triangular formation extremely slow north bound.Icalled my wife and children to the door and we watched this for about two minutes before they dissapeared one at a time.We were all convinced immediately that it was a u.F.O.Not of this world.It was kind of a scary thing,the kind of thing that makes the hair on your neck stand on end.
content.summary: Red glowing spheres flying slowly in triangular formation heading north. dissapeared one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach after paddling in on my surfboard. i noticed him standing relaxed and casual with eyes the size of pool balls and a cranial capacity twice that of earth-human. i thought he was a living star child, like the people who build the pyramids. he moved naturally and didn't say a word. i felt at an impasse with the universe, i wanted to bring him to the local tv station and tell the world but i couldnt muster that popularity was essential at the moment. i even let him pass out of my sight just like all the moments of my life go by.
content.summary: No ufo, alien walking on beach in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: I was drivng about 55 mph. thought i would get some shots of the landscape as the sun was going down. i'm attaching 3 shots, all taken in succession. each shot about 3 seconds apart. i was trying to capture a picture of a very large cloud as it engulfed the sun. the pictures were taken while driving. i simply pointed the camera toward the sun and hoped for the best. the first shot shows an object high in the sky on the left side of the cloud. the second shot shows nothing. the third shot shows the object on the right side of the cloud. i don't know if the distance traveled is normal for a 9 seoond span of time.
content.summary: Driving north on i-29 headed toward sioux city, iowa.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving toward bexley square when i saw the object in the air near bexley. the object was moving away from downtown columbus when it suddenly started going in the other direction toward downtown columbus. it looked like it had some kind of landing gear, but it was not moving like a helicopter and seemed rather small. the sun was hitting the object from the opposite direction from my vantage point so it looked dark. i did not know what the object was when i first spotted it, but i knew that it was not a man made object the moment it suddenly started moving in the opposite direction. i lost sight of the object as it moved toward the sun which was setting. i was surprised to see something like this near a major city, but perhaps it was trying to mostly hide itself in the sun's glare.
content.summary: Was hovering in one direction. abruptly took off in the other!

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:00 pm on july, 13 2010. me and my wife went out side to look at the stars again just before we get ready for bed. to the west we saw an air plane flying south east. after watching it for about 4 minutes i had noticed a ball of white light heading due south from the north around the north star (polaris) at first glance since it was so low and bright i thought it was a helicopter but there was no noise. and it looked like it was only about 300ft off of the ground and was moving very slowy. i would say it was going about 12 mph almost like it was floating. being completely amazed i of course forgot to grab my camera but as it flew over our house i got a good look at it. it was about 200 ft in diameter and was emitting a white light from its spherical center. it had four rotating rings around it that were definately matalic looking and were roatating pretty fast. after 1 minute and 5 seconds it shot up wards into the sky until it was a dim ball of light and then disappeared completely. my wife quickly checked the time and it wass 10:10 pm. so it would have appeared at 10:09.Its location was 31 degrees north by 81 degrees west. i have provided a ruff and quick sketch of the object from what i could see.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large white light traveling slowly and very low and then took off upward.

content.detailedDescription:
At about two a.M. wednesday morning july 13, 2010, my husband and i were laying in bed talking. we have large windows at the foot of our bed. as we chatted i noticed what appeared to be a falling star. not that there was a falling movement to the object but it appeared to come closer to us. this is the movement that caught my attention and made me get out of bed to take a closer look. upon closer examination, i noticed the somewhat rapid yet slow zig zag movement of an object in the sky. as the object turned there appeared many lights in a row along the side of the object. i'm not sure of the exact shape of the object but i'm going to say it was triangle with a bit of elongation to it. at first i thought it to be a falling star, then a plane, then a helicopter. however, the longer the object stayed in the sky, i began to realize it couldn't be 'normal' aircraft. 
i told my husband, he fetched his camera and we walked out onto our deck to look closer. it stayed the same for about twenty minutes. we observed the object while comparing it to the other stars in the sky. we both came to the same realization that this had to be a ufo. we continued to watch the object when, to be honest, i was immediately scared when i realized the object i was looking at couldn't be 'normal' aircraft. i then went into a stage of curiosity followed by worried then by "i don't want to believe this is really happening" . it was at this point that i decided it couldn't be anything so i was going to ignore it and i went to bed. only problem is, i can't stop thinking about what we seen. thus, my reason for sending you this information.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow zig zag moving object with strand of lights hovering in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9:40pm mdt when i stepped out on  my back porch for a cigarette when i noticed a bright light through the slats of the deck above me. my first thoughts was that it was a star because it was bright and to big for an airplane. i noticed it was moving because it was appearing and disappearing through the slats on the deck. i then climbed the steps to ground level and knew for sure this big, bright orb or sphere was certainly moving and at a good clip. i ran inside for my binoculars(yes the batteries were dead in my digital camera) and ran back out and managed to focus on the object before it disappeared behind the clouds. 

the object was a very bright orb or sphere that was very large in size. i noticed no tail like those on meteorites or "shooting stars". one other thing i did notice was there was a plane traveling west to east at the same time the object was moving from north to south. the plane had to have seen it because the plane did cross its path very shortly after the object moved into the clouds.

my sighting was very similar to the one described in case #: 24512
content.summary: Bright sphere moving from north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
Returning from a nightime fishing trip in my truck, my wife and i noticed a strange, yet familiar collection of pulsing lights above our neighborhood. my wife was dozing in the passenger seat, but i was wide awake  from the driving  and made sure to get a good look at the craft.  i was approaching my street and coming down from the sky, hovering near our house was the ufo.  it appeared to fly upward upon our approach and i drove right below it at about 500 ft  as it flew north.   as it went over us i made a point to look with my head out the window and made note of as many details as possible.  the description is included as a sketch attachment. the colored design on the belly was neon-like illuminated and pulsed the exact colors that i often noted on other nights watching what i called "tricky stars".   the ones 30 degrees from the horizon that didnt follow the path of the night sky...   the blinking ufo ultimately took its position in the night sky with the other stars...



please use this report as the primary....I accidentally sent the first prematurely.
content.summary: A pulsing red, blue, white, and yellow object briefly hovered very low  near the house then flew up  into the stars and remained stationary.

content.detailedDescription: On july 10, 2010 at approximately 11:55 p.M. i was looking out my bathroom window towards the ohio river (west) when this red pulsating sphere appeared. it was moving up the river towards pittsburgh (north to south) at about the height of 400 feet. i watched it for about 5 minutes until it disappeared out of view. i think it either came out of the river or it just appeared out of nowhere.
content.summary: Red pulsating sphere that appeared out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were about to go to the store when my wife said "look how twinkly that star is!"  i looked up and it was just a bright star but now we were watching the sky. my wife said, "look at that over there, that's a plane flying high right?"  i said, "no planes have flashing lights." we then decided that it was still too bright outside to see a sattelite as we could only see venus and one other star at the time. it was confirmed, in my mind, not to be a sattelite when it flew in an arcing type path silently pusating and moving in front of and behind clouds. we lost sight of it when below the tree line of the neighboring street.
content.summary: Pulsating orb moving in front of and behind clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday night, may 15, 2010, at approximately 8:30 p.M., i was putting something in the trunk of my car.  as i headed back into my house, i noticed an extremely bright light in the sky behind my house.  i was immediately struck by the brightness of the object because it had just turned dark.  i observed it for a moment or two, wondering if it was a planet.  when i realized that there were no other stars in the sky yet, i became more intrigued.  i therefore decided to observe it longer.  5 minutes turned into 10 minutes, and i called my husband outside to ask him what he thought it was.  he first thought it was a planet or the "north star," but as he observed it longer, he thought it was "a little strange."  the light was not moving and made absolutely no sound.  after approximately 10  minutes, my husband decided to go back into the house.  i, however, remained transfixed, and continued my observation for approximately 30-40 minutes longer before i decided to go back into my house to get my camera.  at approximately 9:15-20 p.M., i took photos of the light. during the entire 40-45 minutes of my constant observation of this light, it remained in relatively the same spot in the sky.  [it is important to note that we live less than one mile away from the mercer county airport and literally see planes landing on the runway (running west to east) through the trees in our backyard.  this light, however, was directly north, and during my observation of this light, continued to see planes fly in front of it.]  as i began to take pictures of the light (which visually remained static) i noticed that when i found it in my camera viewfinder the object appeared to be moving very rapidly and quickly in a haphazard way.  when i moved my eyes away from the camera to observe the light, it appeared perfectly still to my eyes!  i took 8 pictures of the light on may 15th. after i took my 8 pictures, the light simply disappeared. during my observation of the light, i was not frightened, simply intrigued and highly curious about what i was observing.  it is also important to note that i was seeking some confirmation that it might be an airplane flying south, however, at no time did i observe flashing beacon lights.

the light appeared again in the same relative spot in the sky on sunday, june 6th, 2010 at approximately 8:00 p.M.  my husband and i were returning home and i noticed the same very bright light as i got out of our car.  it was earlier than the previous 5/15/10 sighting, and the sky was somewhat lighter. again, there were no other observable stars yet in the sky, thereby highlighting the intensity and oddness of this particular light. i immediately retrieved my camera and took 7 pictures of the light.  i observed the light intermittently (i.E., i kept coming outside from the house to check on it rather than strictly observing it as i did on 5/15) for approximately 40 to 50 minutes. just as in the first sighting, the light remained static (to my eye) and remained in the same relative position in the sky.  the final time i checked, it was gone (approximately 9:00 p.M. or so.) since my two sightings of this intense light (and subsequent review of my pictures), i am highly curious about it and am hoping that someone can explain what it is to me.  i now find myself looking for the light every night, but have not seen it since the 6/6/10 sighting.
content.summary: Observed very bright, static light in sky behind my house on 2 separate nights.

content.detailedDescription:
I take my dog out about 10pm every nigh.  a month ago i took her out and was looking up and saw a star-like object and it was moving.  i thought it was a satellite but it was moving faster.  when it made a perfect 90 degree turn it was obvious it was military or something else.

the turn radius was not a "standard rate turn" as defined by the faa.  

i watched it go out of site.  then another came and did the same maneuver.  

those sightings were not reported to mufon.  i wasn't sure if they were military or not.

last night at i took my dog out early.  when i cam back in and laid down i saw an object out my window.  at first i thought of jupiter.  but it was to far north.  jupiter comes up in the se.  it also was not a bright as jupiter.

the object was 30 degrees off the horizon and n 60 degrees.  as it was sitting still i guessed it's distance in relation to the mountains to be about 30 miles.

i got my binoculars and then it started to move north and dim.  i tracked it for about 15 seconds as it dimmed and went out of site.  

there were no aircraft lighting.

this was not a conventional airplane.  they don't sit still!  it was not a helicopter.  helicopters do not accelerate that quickly.

this object was like the sighting in norway which has the movie attached.

reported from n38.58.169  w106.13.166
content.summary: Very bright then dimmed when it began to move.

content.detailedDescription:
This was an event that i can not simply explain away as "normal". at approximatly 10:00 p.M. my partner and i were sitting in tha back yard of a friends home here in kokomo indiana. our friend spoke up and said "wow look over there, what is that?" what the three of us saw was a bright white/orange ball flying across the sky. it was to slow and low to be a shooting star. we watched it for about two minutes and then it vanished suddenly. of course we were filled with interest and just kept repeating "what was that?". little did we know this was just the beginning.

we went inside the house for approx. 30-40 minutes and then came back outside. when we walked out i looked to the west and saw what i would naturally think was an airplane. it had flashing lights and was moving rather quickly so we just watched it. our friends son came to the door so she went inside to turn on a show for him. while she was inside we continued to watch this "airplane" fly toward us. the flashing was very erratic. red, orange, white, yellow flickering lights. as it got overhead we noticed that it appeard to be triangular in shape and was completely silent. then as it got to the tree line it stopped. this aircraft stopped in dead air and did a full reverse. at this point there appeard two more of these aircrafts. they flew right past each other and very close to one another. the craft that did the full reverse seemed to be just sitting there in mid air. at this point it appeard to be round and the flickering became more erattic. then we realized this aircraft was not just sitting there it was actually ascending upward slowly. the other two were now gone but this one was slowing rising upward. it took a moment to realize what we were seeing. at first it was as if our eyes were playing tricks on us, but no it was rising. it eventually rose so far up that we could no longer see it. there was no sound. they were completely silent. 

at this point we were just in pure shock and amazement. i ran in and got our friend to tell her what we had just seen and she came back outside. when we got back out we saw yet another appear. it flew across the sky at a pace an airplane would. then more appeared and continued across the sky. they all had the same erratic blinking and were not in a normal flight pattern. this continued for the next few hours. all together we saw anywhere from 15-20 of these before we went indoors.

we would have thought these were airplanes with a lot of flikering lights if we had not seen the one craft stop and do a reverse and then ascend straight up. it was difficult to discern the shape. it appeared to be a triangle yet when it rose up became circular, maybe it was even the flickering light pattern that changed to appear circular, i just dont know. even today as i sit here and type this there is a loss for words. 

there is not a rational explanation in our opinion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1st was a solid white/orange ball of light, the rest were very odd flickering/erratic lights sometimes appeared circular, then triangular.

content.detailedDescription:
July 14, 2010

my ufo experience

this sighting is not a new one.  it is a sighting that occurred between 1954 and 1955.  i was born in february 16, 1948.  however, i wanted this sighting documented as i am the last one in my family alive that saw this incident.

when i was a child, my mother, father and myself lived at 210 6th street on miami beach, fl.  (what is now south beach) i was approximately six or seven years old.  i believe i was in second grade at the time.

every day, when my father would come home from work, we (my mother, father and myself) would walk over to the beach which was a block and a half from our bungalow.
on the beach there is a small coral wall approximately 2' high that runs the length of the beach.  we would enter thru one of the openings and walk down the beach to the shoreline.  on this particular day there appeared six ufo's right over the shoreline of the beach.  they were very very low and were directly over the shoreline as well.  they were in a kind of v formation.  there was no point to the v but they were staggered two by two by two.  each set of two a little farther apart than the previous two.  the amazing thing about these ufo's was that they were going at walking speed.

as my mom, pop and myself walked toward the shoreline i watched as people from the street and all over the beach started to walk quickly and even run toward these ufo's.  a crowd gathered and everybody on the beach was walking with the ufo's.  this lasted for about ten to fifteen minutes and i could clearly see the ufo's from the their underside.  i can't say what size they were because in retrospect i was a child myself and a lot of things looked big to me.  however, they appeared really big to me.  there was a light pattern on each of them, all clearly the exact same as each other.  there was no sound coming from the ufo's either.

while everybody was walking with the ufo's there appeared two jets coming from the south.  homestead air force base was about 20 to 30 miles from south beach.  they flew down toward the ufo's going over the shoreline and as they approached the six ufo's they split off at an unbelievable speed in six different directions upward.  they went so fast that as the two jets approached in their downward flight towards the ufo's it gave the impression that the jets were standing still for a brief moment.  as the jets screamed by the crowd on the beach, the ufo's regrouped way up in the sky and came back down to the shoreline exactly where they were before.

it took the 2 jets quite a while to get back up and circle around and come back down towards the ufo's.  again, the ufo's split in six different directions, only this time they didn't come back down to the beach.  in a brief moment they were gone in the blink of an eye.

the next day, in school, the teacher asked how many students had seen the ufo's.  as i recall it was somewhere between half to three-quarters of the class.  she then asked that we draw what we saw.  this was extremely interesting to me as everyone drew the ufo's that they had seen and some were round and some were oval.  some looked one way and some looked the other.  however what was extremely interesting to me even at that time was the fact that no matter what the shape they perceived, the light pattern on all the ufo drawings was exactly the same.

as the years went by, since i had seen this event at such a young age with my mom and pop, what has been the strangest thing about this event was that when people questioned the existence of ufo's, having seen them myself, my view wasn't that the people who saw ufo's were nuts, but people that hadn't seen them and didn't believe in them were nuts.

my mom recently passed and the day before she passed she asked me if i had remembered the event that had taken place on miami beach when i was a child.  i told her that it had been the most momentous event in my life and i realized the it even eclipsed kennedy's death.

over the years my dad, who passed away in 1991. would talk with me and he had a hard time acknowledging this event.  he could describe it in detail but he just kept saying that it wasn't a ufo event, but something we just didn't know about.  he was born in 1903 and saw a lot of things in his life and this was just something he couldn't grasp.

obviously, i have been fascinated by ufo's since that event.  i've become a fan of science pertaining to the multi-verse and have found that the amount of galaxies and stars out there are so immense that if one billionth of one percent of the stars that are out there have intelligent life on them, then there would be billions of life forms in our multi-verse.

i belong to the south florida int'l press club and at the last meeting i found some of the reporters that think they remember the incident on miami beach at that time.  i have also looked to try and find pictures of the six ufo's and actually found a picture of them, not in miami beach but in houston in 1956 flying in the same v formation.

well, that is my account of my encounter with a ufo sighting and i just wanted to get it on record, as it has been the biggest event in my life and i am very grateful to have been part of actually seeing not one, but six ufo's.

if you have any questions or i can be of further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me at any of the above contacts.

i remain,

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)
content.summary: They appeared round and very large-all six were the same size.

content.detailedDescription: Over the course of living in bath with family from 1990-1993 objects were witnessed both very high in the sky that flashed unusual colors that are not used by typical aircraft such as planes/helicopters (pinks, oranges, reds, purples, etc.) these appeared as spherical flashing lights with no discernable form that moved at very rapid rate in comparison to stationary objects such as stars. these flashing lights were seen stationary and within seconds would speed off in in unusual trajectories.  similar lights were also seen at ground-level and were flashing behind trees,indicating that they were not in the sky. nearby neighbors appeared to have alleged crop circles burned into their back yard lawn around the same timeframe the lights were occurring.  these occurances were witnessed by myself and my aunt.
content.summary: Bright flashing lights of non-aerospace colors (purple, green, pink, etc).

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east bound on greenfiled ave around 100th street at 7:34 am on 7/14/2010, when i saw what looked like a balloon floating over the wisconsin state fair grounds.  i though at first it might be a car sale that had a huge balloon attached to it, but i did not see any string.  the object looked like a clear blimp, and i could clearly see the sun glinting off of it.  it was a clear day, not a cloud on the sky. i saw the object once, and then looked back at it again.  on the third time, it appeared to shink in size, then the forth time, it disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo appeared in nnw sky while i was traveling east on greenfield ave. looked 3 times it was there, gone on third.

content.detailedDescription: I been investigating ufo phenomenon on internett for some time, and im thinking i dont look up at the sky eneugh, maybe 28-29 june i look out the window and i see a yellow/white orb flying across the sky i go out but i dont know where the camera is so i dont get a chance to film it.. then after that i made my camera ready in case it will show up again, and it did. couple of days later i filmed this
content.summary: Ufo in norway filmed with hd camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I was running sound for *(identifying info deleted--sgonzalez/cms) in bellevue washington. my wife was taking pictures of the band and this showed up in the pictures that are attached. i will tell you that we were outdoors, we had no lights set up. this anomaly was in the pictures we were viewing from the event.
this was not an airplane. i would have seen it from my vantage point, and we have another picture taken one minute later from nearly the same angle and it is not ont the picture. 
i will submit the camera for testing.. this is not photoshopped. it is not a fake. please contact me if you think this warrants further investigation. 
the photos are attached, one is cropped. the other is the original.
please do not make this public unless i release it. *(info deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i dont want to make waves.
content.summary: Did not see it.

content.detailedDescription: At 1 am my husband and i were looking at something on our laptop while lying in bed i looked out our windows and in the tree top i saw a triangle of light i watched for a few seconds as it was not moving i told my husband and he looked and at this time it slowly started to move and it passed over top of our house and my husband went out side and could not see any trace of it anywhere he then noticed that there was no sounds no planes or anything and we live near an airport but i have never seen a plane fly like this. the whole thing feels very strange because how the object was slow at first and the took off my husband was amazed by this and we both noted that the craft was hard to look directly at it was blury. it just went over the top of our house and disappered
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Saw it out the window it sat and then took off.

content.detailedDescription: In st. louis at 7:14 pm i was sitting with my back to a window having a conversation with *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms), 25 years old. his face suddenly changed to a look of surprise while talking with me and sat back and said "what was that?" he described seeing a white object, possibly a white sphere with a trailing tail, zip out diagonally from behind a tree out the window behind me and shoot up into the sky. he doesn't think it was a firework because it moved much too fast, and was too "perfect" in its shape and tail and trajectory. he thought it could have been some sort of "craft," but knows it was not a conventional craft. it was enough for him to say that it was the first time he's ever seen an unidentified flying object, by definition. a facsimiie is attached to this report, made with a picture taken within 10 minutes of the actual sighting, so the picture's conditions are essentially as they were when *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) saw the object over my right shoulder out the window. ironically, *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) mother saw what she describes as the first unidentied flying object she ever saw while on the way over to my house last september, 2009. also in that same month, about two weeks later, she and i heard and felt an explosion outside my home while inside, as did my neighbors in their homes. my next door neighbors said they saw a large white ball of light that appeared over the street for the duration of the explosion sound that was felt and heard by us all.
content.summary: White teardrop appears to zip from ground to sky.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were talking when i realized it was 9pm. we had a sighting several nights ago at 9pm and have been trying to head outside every night at that time and watch the skies. we had missed it the last two nights. tonight, we stepped outside and within a minute a bright white light showed up, northeast of my position. above it, a plane was at an incline with faa lights blinking and i could see its wings clearly. i grabbed my binoculars and watched the object fly across the sky at a slow, steady pace. it had no blinking lights and the object itself was so illuminated that you couldn't see it's shape or any detail. it looked like venus does when it's closest to earth. due to the path that it took, i saw at least 180 degrees of the object and yet i saw no details or edges. the intensity of the light stayed consistent as it flew over the back of the building behind my parking lot and out of my vision. the whole sighting lasted about 3 minutes. i have had numerous sightings from the same location and this is by far the most intriguing. the pilot of that plane had to see something and i watched about a dozen more planes fly through over the next several minutes. i'm located close enough to several airports (o'hare, midway, milwaukee) to see some of their traffic and am an avid sky watcher. i know what a plane looks like, what helicopters look like, even what potentially hazardous asteroids look like as they burn up in our atmosphere... this was different. i was very excited during this sighting and have had a hard time calming down. it was as if we walked outside at the exact right moment to have that experience.
content.summary: Bright white light flew nw-se slowly. watched through binoculars.
